localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Been working on an icon set off and on over the last year, and I am finally releasing V1 today! What You'll Get: • Sketch File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights • Figma File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights
blogPost.body: Been working on an icon set off and on over the last year, and I am finally releasing V1 today! What You'll Get: • Sketch File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights • Figma File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights
blogPost.title: Friendly Line Icon Set - 150+ meticulously crafted line icons
blogPost.author: Eddy Gann

localize.description: 在过去的一年里，我一直在断断续续地研究一个图标集，今天我终于发布了V1! 你会得到什么。- 草图文件 - 150多个细线型、标准型和薄型的图标 - Figma文件 - 150多个细线型、标准型和薄型的图标。
在過去的一年裏，我一直在斷斷續續地研究一個圖標集，今天我終於發佈了V1! 你會得到什麼。- 草圖文件 - 150多個細線型、標準型和薄型的圖標 - Figma文件 - 150多個細線型、標準型和薄型的圖標。

previous.excerpt: 11 ports USB-C hub, wireless charger, laptop stand designed in one. Create a workspace that is more comfortable and efficient anywhere.
previous.title: TopWork - 11 ports USB-C hub, wireless charger& laptop stand in one.

localize.description: 11口USB-C集线器、无线充电器、笔记本支架设计于一体。打造一个更舒适、更高效的随时随地的工作空间。
localize.tagline: 11个端口的USB-C集线器，无线充电器和笔记本电脑支架于一体。

localize.description: 11口USB-C集線器、無線充電器、筆記本支架設計於一體。打造一個更舒適、更高效的隨時隨地的工作空間。
localize.tagline: 11個端口的USB-C集線器，無線充電器和筆記本電腦支架於一體。

next.excerpt: Rysolv provides a platform for users to share issues, contribute to open source, and get paid for their work. 💸 Anyone can create an issue or contribute towards a bounty. Whoever submits a solution closing out the issue earns the bounty.
next.title: rysolv - Fix open source issues, get paid

localize.description: Rysolv 为用户提供了一个分享问题、为开源做贡献并获得报酬的平台。💸任何人都可以创建一个问题或为赏金做出贡献。谁提交了结束问题的解决方案，谁就能获得赏金。
localize.tagline: 修复开源问题，获得报酬

localize.description: Rysolv 爲用戶提供了一個分享問題、爲開源做貢獻並獲得報酬的平臺。💸任何人都可以創建一個問題或爲賞金做出貢獻。誰提交了結束問題的解決方案，誰就能獲得賞金。
localize.tagline: 修復開源問題，獲得報酬
